name: Invisible Homes
slogan: Revolutionising the buying and selling of residential properties in the UK
description:
A two sided market place to make residential housing market efficient

Until now, there have only two options - Traditional and Online / Hybrid estate agent. 
But both of them are limited. Traditional agents charge a high commission fee for an often poor quality and impersonal experience and online and hybrid agents who list on sites like Rightmove and Zoopla.

However, these online agents lack direct access to buyers, which hinders their sales ability and makes them even less effective for sellers than traditional agents.

We  addresse both of these existing limitations and makes life easier for everyone.
Buyers join our community (there are currently over 3,000 of them) and tell us what they’re looking for. Then, together with our local agents we match them up with sellers whose homes meet their requirements. A little bit like a dating app.
Buyers gain access to unique opportunities they wouldn’t find elsewhere. And sellers get their property in front of more relevant buyers.

jobs.title: Graduate marketing internship in exciting start-up
jobs.description:
Preferred :

Demonstrable experience or knowledge of digital marketing
Requirements :

2:1 or above degree
London based
Immediate start
Ability to work under pressure within a small team in a constantly changing environment.
Self-motivated
Strong numeracy skills
English language : Native / Fluent
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Confident and outgoing
Role :

This role will involve having a hand in all aspects of digital and non-digital marketing campaigns, as well as a wide variety of other tasks.

This role would suit someone looking to launch their career in marketing, and is a unique opportunity to be involved in fast paced start-up.

Salary: Competitive
